Mongezi Thomas Stuurman (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1995 - ruo abali itoolu nke onwa ọgọstụ afọ 2021), nke a maara dị ka Mpura, bụ onye na-eti egwu rap na South Africa, onye na-emepụta ejiji na onye na-eme ihe ndekọ nke a maara nke ọma maka egwu ya "Umsebenzi Wethu"
A mụrụ Mpura ma zụlite ya na Soweto, Gauteng
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Highlands North Boys High School.
Tupu ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama na ụlọ ọrụ egwu, ọ na-etinye aka na ejiji ma guzobe ụlọ mmepụta ejiji ọ kpọrọ Mpura Designs, ụdị akara ejiji ma nwoke ma nwanyị
N'afọ 2018, o mere ngosi ejiji nke mbụ ya na izu ngosi ejiji nke South African Fashion , na-egosi nchịkọta ya nke Autumn / Winter 2019.

N'abali iri na otu nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2020, eweputara ya na Busta 929 nke gosipụtara Lady Du, Reece Madlisa, Maazị JazziQ na Zuma otu Umsebenzi Wethu. Egwú ahụ ruru nọmba otu n'ime chaatị iTunes ma bụrụ platinum.
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021, Mpura nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala n'ụzọ ọ na-aga ime ihe omume na North West, n'akụkụ Killer Kau.
